General.Name: Dien Quang JSC
General.Description: Dien Quang Group Joint Stock Company manufactures and sells lighting products, smart control products, and electrical equipment in Vietnam. The company offers lighting and smart control technology solutions that are used in civil, industrial, agricultural, office, hospital, school, city, etc.; professional lighting solutions for decoration, commerce, industry, landscape, embellishment, building, and street lighting; household appliances; and solar products. It also exports its products to 30 countries and territories worldwide. The company was formerly known as Dien Quang Lamp Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Dien Quang Group Joint Stock Company in May 2023. Dien Quang Group Joint Stock Company was founded in 1973 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
